documentation.text:
@title XRC20 Token
 @dev This is the a XinFin Network Compatible XRC20 token.
@dev Return the totalSupply value stored in _totalSupply.

@dev Return the balance of a given address.
 @param account The account which the balance is being called.

devdoc.details: This is the a XinFin Network Compatible XRC20 token.

allowance(address,address).details: Return the allowance of a given address for this XRC20 token.

params.spender: Address allowed to spend tokens on owner's behalf.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approve another account to spend tokens.

params.amount: The amount of tokens which can be spent.
params.spender: The account to be allowed the spending of tokens.

balanceOf(address).details: Return the balance of a given address.

params.account: The account which the balance is being called.

totalSupply().details: Return the totalSupply value stored in _totalSupply.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfer tokens on behalf of another account.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to send.
params.recipient: The account to receive the tokens.
params.sender: The account the tokens should be sent from.

devdoc.title: XRC20 Token
